mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_ID , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMAIL , E.CNTCT , C.CMCD_NAME , E.PRFL FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN ASSIGNMENT A ON E.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON E.PSTN_ID = C.CMCD_ID WHERE A.TM_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_ID = E.DEPT_ID JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_ID = E.JOB_ID
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
